category.desc: Modify Presentation API Implementation on Android to follow W3C Spec
category.name: XWALK-4646

testcase.purpose: Test checks that Availability basic attribute
Test checks that the value property of an Availability object to offer presentation only when there are available displays
Test checks that navigator.presentation.getAvailability should return Availability Object
Test checks that we can call joinSession method for known session in the set of presentation
Test checks that No available presentation displays will throw a DOMException named 'NotFoundError'
Test checks that Event defaultsessionstart is fired when the UA initiates a presentation on behalf of the page
Test checks that navigator.presentation.startSession should return PresentationSession Object
Test checks that PresentationSession basic attributes
Test checks that when send message with type arraybuffer, then initialise event's data attribute to a new ArrayBuffer object whose contents are presentation message data
Test checks that when send message with type blob, then initialise event's data attribute to a new Blob object that represents presentation message data as its raw data
Test checks that Session state value is 'connected' or 'disconnected'
Test checks that an example of playing video on presentation displays
